comments:
When running CachingTest in environment where extension is actually installed it fails on step 4 when we have installed just the demo.hello bundle but it is still supplemented by the absent demo.tracing bundle. However there is still a problem in the AspectJStorageHook.

The failure is actually caused by an old version of demo.tracing which used EclipseSupplement-Bundle. This has now moved to demo.tracing.coopt.
